page.title: 11Brechin In The 1980's-1
page.content: I like Brechin because it is a quiet place and there is not much violence or trouble.There are not many big lorries which come through the Town because there was a By-Pass built a few years ago. Lorries only come into Brechin when they are delivering to the Supermarkets. I think there could be more interesting things to do.We do not have a Leisure Centre,only a Community Centre.we have to travel 7 Miles to the nearest Swimming Pool which is not very convenient. There are quite good shops in Brechin but I like going to Dundee to get a better choice of clothing.We have one good Department Store.There is one really expensive Clothes Shop in Brechin called Rags.It costs between Â£50 to Â£100 for a jumper but they really are beautiful.
